description:
The Akudarma Trio arrive at Edo to find Katsushika Hokusai, who was famous for his “Thirty-Six Views of Mount Fuji.” They find a crowd looking at an old man on a ladder, drawing something on a roof. Wait, that’s Katsushika Hokusai? Apparently he’s rather fearless when it comes to his art and the trio have a hard time keeping up with him and then Tokio and Calen show up. Which team will find the perfect view of Mount Fuji for Hokusai to paint and win the Dynamond?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nippon ga Sekai ni Hokoru Ukiyoeshi Katsushika Hokusai ga 93 Kai mo Hikikoshita Bikkuri Dokkuri na Riyuu to wa!?
What`s the Super Surprising Reason the Famous Japanese Ukiyo-e Artist Katsushika Hakusai Moved 93 Times?!
日本が世界に誇る浮世絵師葛飾北斎が93回も引っ越したビックリドッキリな理由とは!?
